sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The co-winners of the Nobel Peace Prize, Russia's oldest human rights organization memorial, Ukraine's Center of Civil Liberties, and Alice B. Eliatsky, a jailed Belarusian activist, have been honored at an awards ceremony in Oslo.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It comes as Alexandra Matvichuk from Ukraine's Center of Civil Liberties told reporters on Friday that Russian President Putin and Belarusian President Lukashenko should be brought to justice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We must break the circle of impunity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We must establish international tribunal and hold Putin, Lukashenko and other war criminals accountable, not only for Ukrainians, but for the other nations in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Memorial, acclaimed for its studies on political repression, was shut down by Russia's Supreme Court in December 2021 after the Duma declared the organization a foreign agent in 2016.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The imprisoned B. Eliatsky has become the fourth person in the 121-year history of the Nobel Prizes to win an award while behind bars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The triple prize has been seen as a strong rebuke of Putin and Lukashenko's crackdown on democracy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A vice president within European Parliament has been suspended amid a lobbying scandal involving a Gulf state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Socialists and Democrats group said it has revoked MEP Eva Kiley's membership with immediate effect.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Belgian police carried out several raids on Friday and made four arrests as part of an ongoing probe into corruption.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This is a file that was already opened a few months ago by the federal prosecutor's office, the spokesperson says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It is a file for suspected corruption, money laundering and criminal organization, which concerns potential corruption in the European Parliament by a Persian Gulf state.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The purpose of bribery is to try to change the political or economic decisions of the European Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Greek PASOK movement party has also suspended and distanced itself from the MEP after she praised Qatar in Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: While prosecutors have declined to name the country concerned, the S&D group says it wants the Assembly to discuss the quote on a folding guitar lobbying scandal next week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Despite the pouring rain, hundreds of students gathered in front of the MTVA headquarters, a state-owned media company on Friday in Budapest, Hungary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Friday in Budapest, Hungary. The students were backing teachers sacked for rebelling over humiliating low pay and years of government neglect.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I spoke to many of my former teachers about this and heard from all of them about the difficulties they are going through.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I want to help them and we deserve a better education, a better future also.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Just last week, eight teachers were dismissed by Budapest's school district for daring to protest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I think they are messing with the wrong generation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Hungarian teachers are the lowest paid of any EU member state, with cashiers making more money than them.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Hungary is already in the grip of a chronic teacher shortage, with fewer young people joining the profession.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A hostage situation in Dresden has ended, with the main suspect reportedly dying after suffering a fatal injury, according to German police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Earlier on Saturday, shots were reportedly fired in the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But after midday local time, police wrote on Twitter that the situation was over and that they had two seemingly uninjured people in their care.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Police had also separately reported the body of a 62-year-old woman had been found.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But they did not confirm that the killing had been connected to the hostage situation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Three humanitarian rescue ships with over 500 migrants on board have been given permission to dock overnight in Italy because of bad weather.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: These are the first ships to be received by Italy after Rome refused to let hundreds of rescued migrants disembark in November.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But despite what could seem like a shift in its controversial policy, Rome has said that they are not going to do a, quote, U-turn when it comes to immigration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Pro-democracy media mogul Jimmy Lai has been handed a five-year and nine-month jail term by a Hong Kong court.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The next digital boss was found guilty of fraud on two charges linked to alleged lease violations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This is the latest in a series of cases against prominent activists.
